016package io.micronaut.maven.testresources;
017
018import io.micronaut.maven.services.DependencyResolutionService;
019import io.micronaut.testresources.buildtools.MavenDependency;
020import io.micronaut.testresources.buildtools.ServerFactory;
021import io.micronaut.testresources.buildtools.ServerSettings;
022import io.micronaut.testresources.buildtools.ServerUtils;
023import io.micronaut.testresources.buildtools.TestResourcesClasspath;
024import org.apache.maven.execution.MavenSession;
025import org.apache.maven.model.Dependency;
026import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
027import org.apache.maven.plugin.logging.Log;
028import org.apache.maven.plugin.logging.SystemStreamLog;
029import org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject;
030import org.apache.maven.toolchain.ToolchainManager;
031import org.eclipse.aether.artifact.Artifact;
032import org.eclipse.aether.resolution.DependencyResolutionException;
033
034import java.io.File;
035import java.io.IOException;
036import java.nio.file.Files;
037import java.nio.file.Path;
038import java.nio.file.StandardCopyOption;
039import java.util.Collections;
040import java.util.HashMap;
041import java.util.List;
042import java.util.Map;
043import java.util.Optional;
044import java.util.UUID;
045import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean;
046import java.util.stream.Stream;
047
048import static io.micronaut.maven.services.DependencyResolutionService.toClasspathFiles;
049import static java.util.stream.Stream.concat;
050
051/**
052 * Utility class to stop Test Resources service.
053 */
054public class TestResourcesHelper {
055
056    private static final String TEST_RESOURCES_PROPERTIES = "test-resources.properties";
057    private static final String PORT_FILE_NAME = "test-resources-port.txt";
058
059    private static final String TEST_RESOURCES_CLIENT_SYSTEM_PROP_PREFIX = "micronaut.test.resources.";
060
061    private static final String TEST_RESOURCES_PROP_SERVER_URI = TEST_RESOURCES_CLIENT_SYSTEM_PROP_PREFIX + "server.uri";
062    private static final String TEST_RESOURCES_PROP_ACCESS_TOKEN = TEST_RESOURCES_CLIENT_SYSTEM_PROP_PREFIX + "server.access.token";
063    private static final String TEST_RESOURCES_PROP_CLIENT_READ_TIMEOUT = TEST_RESOURCES_CLIENT_SYSTEM_PROP_PREFIX + "server.client.read.timeout";
064
065    private final boolean enabled;
066
067    private final MavenSession mavenSession;
068
069    private final boolean shared;
070
071    private final File buildDirectory;
072
073    private final Log log;
074
075    private Integer explicitPort;
076
077    private Integer clientTimeout;
078
079    private Integer serverIdleTimeoutMinutes;
080
081    private MavenProject mavenProject;
082
083    private DependencyResolutionService dependencyResolutionService;
084
085    private ToolchainManager toolchainManager;
086
087    private String testResourcesVersion;
088
089    private boolean classpathInference;
090
091    private List<Dependency> testResourcesDependencies;
092
093    private String sharedServerNamespace;
094
095    private boolean debugServer;
096
097    public TestResourcesHelper(boolean enabled,
098                               boolean shared,
099                               File buildDirectory,
100                               Integer explicitPort,
101                               Integer clientTimeout,
102                               Integer serverIdleTimeoutMinutes,
103                               MavenProject mavenProject,
104                               MavenSession mavenSession,
105                               DependencyResolutionService dependencyResolutionService,
106                               ToolchainManager toolchainManager,
107                               String testResourcesVersion,
108                               boolean classpathInference,
109                               List<Dependency> testResourcesDependencies,
110                               String sharedServerNamespace,
111                               boolean debugServer) {
112        this(mavenSession, enabled, shared, buildDirectory);
113        this.explicitPort = explicitPort;
114        this.clientTimeout = clientTimeout;
115        this.serverIdleTimeoutMinutes = serverIdleTimeoutMinutes;
116        this.mavenProject = mavenProject;
117        this.dependencyResolutionService = dependencyResolutionService;
118        this.toolchainManager = toolchainManager;
119        this.testResourcesVersion = testResourcesVersion;
120        this.classpathInference = classpathInference;
121        this.testResourcesDependencies = testResourcesDependencies;
122        this.sharedServerNamespace = sharedServerNamespace;
123        this.debugServer = debugServer;
124    }
125
126    public TestResourcesHelper(MavenSession mavenSession, boolean enabled, boolean shared, File buildDirectory) {
127        this.mavenSession = mavenSession;
128        this.enabled = enabled;
129        this.shared = shared;
130        this.buildDirectory = buildDirectory;
131        this.log = new SystemStreamLog();
132    }
133
134    private boolean isKeepAlive() {
135        boolean hasKeepAliveFile = Files.exists(getKeepAliveFile());
136        return hasKeepAliveFile || isStartExplicitlyInvoked();
137    }
138
139    private boolean isStartExplicitlyInvoked() {
140        return mavenSession.getGoals()
141            .stream()
142            .anyMatch(goal -> goal.equals("mn:" + StartTestResourcesServerMojo.NAME));
143    }
144
145    /**
146     * Starts the Test Resources Service.
147     */
148    public void start() throws MojoExecutionException {
149        if (!enabled) {
150            return;
151        }
152        try {
153            doStart();
154        } catch (Exception e) {
155            throw new MojoExecutionException("Unable to start test resources server", e);
156        }
157    }
158
159    private void doStart() throws IOException {
160        String accessToken = UUID.randomUUID().toString();
161        Path buildDir = buildDirectory.toPath();
162        Path serverSettingsDirectory = getServerSettingsDirectory();
163        AtomicBoolean serverStarted = new AtomicBoolean(false);
164        ServerFactory serverFactory = new DefaultServerFactory(log, toolchainManager, mavenSession, serverStarted, testResourcesVersion, debugServer);
165        Optional<ServerSettings> optionalServerSettings = startOrConnectToExistingServer(accessToken, buildDir, serverSettingsDirectory, serverFactory);
166        if (optionalServerSettings.isPresent()) {
167            ServerSettings serverSettings = optionalServerSettings.get();
168            if (shared) {
169                if (sharedServerNamespace != null) {
170                    log.info("Test Resources is configured in shared mode with the namespace: " + sharedServerNamespace);
171                    //Copy the server settings to the default location so that TR Client can find it
172                    Path projectSettingsDirectory = serverSettingsDirectoryOf(buildDirectory.toPath());
173                    Files.createDirectories(projectSettingsDirectory);
174
175                    Path source = serverSettingsDirectory.resolve(TEST_RESOURCES_PROPERTIES);
176                    Path target = projectSettingsDirectory.resolve(TEST_RESOURCES_PROPERTIES);
177                    Files.copy(source, target, StandardCopyOption.REPLACE_EXISTING);
178                } else {
179                    log.info("Test Resources is configured in shared mode");
180                }
181            }
182            setSystemProperties(serverSettings);
183            if (serverStarted.get()) {
184                if (isKeepAlive()) {
185                    log.info("Micronaut Test Resources service is started in the background. To stop it, run the following command: 'mvn mn:" + StopTestResourcesServerMojo.NAME + "'");
186                }
187            } else {
188                // A server was already listening, which means it was running before
189                // the build was started, so we put a file to indicate to the stop
190                // mojo that it should not stop the server.
191                Path keepalive = getKeepAliveFile();
192                // Test is because we may be running in watch mode
193                if (!Files.exists(keepalive)) {
194                    Files.write(keepalive, "true".getBytes());
195                    Runtime.getRuntime().addShutdownHook(new Thread(() -> {
196                        // Make sure that if the build is interrupted, e.g using CTRL+C, the keepalive file is deleted
197                        try {
198                            deleteKeepAliveFile();
199                        } catch (MojoExecutionException e) {
200                            // ignore, we're in a shutdown hook
201                        }
202                    }));
203                }
204            }
205        }
206    }
207
208    /**
209     * Computes the system properties to set for the test resources client to be able to connect to the server.
210     *
211     * @param serverSettings The server settings
212     * @return The system properties
213     */
214    public Map<String, String> computeSystemProperties(ServerSettings serverSettings) {
215        Map<String, String> systemProperties = new HashMap<>(3);
216        String uri = String.format("http://localhost:%d", serverSettings.getPort());
217        systemProperties.put(TEST_RESOURCES_PROP_SERVER_URI, uri);
218        serverSettings.getAccessToken().ifPresent(accessToken -> systemProperties.put(TEST_RESOURCES_PROP_ACCESS_TOKEN, accessToken));
219        serverSettings.getClientTimeout().ifPresent(timeout -> systemProperties.put(TEST_RESOURCES_PROP_CLIENT_READ_TIMEOUT, String.valueOf(timeout)));
220        return systemProperties;
221    }
222
223    private void setSystemProperties(ServerSettings serverSettings) {
224        computeSystemProperties(serverSettings).forEach(System::setProperty);
225    }
226
227    private Optional<ServerSettings> startOrConnectToExistingServer(String accessToken, Path buildDir, Path serverSettingsDirectory, ServerFactory serverFactory) {
228        try {
229            return Optional.ofNullable(
230                    ServerUtils.startOrConnectToExistingServer(
231                        explicitPort,
232                        buildDir.resolve(PORT_FILE_NAME),
233                        serverSettingsDirectory,
234                        accessToken,
235                        resolveServerClasspath(),
236                        clientTimeout,
237                        serverIdleTimeoutMinutes,
238                        serverFactory
239                    )
240            );
241        } catch (Exception e) {
242            log.error("Error starting Micronaut Test Resources service", e);
243            return Optional.empty();
244        }
245    }
246
247    private List<File> resolveServerClasspath() throws DependencyResolutionException {
248        List<MavenDependency> applicationDependencies = Collections.emptyList();
249        if (classpathInference) {
250            applicationDependencies = getApplicationDependencies();
251        }
252        Stream<Artifact> serverDependencies =
253                TestResourcesClasspath.inferTestResourcesClasspath(applicationDependencies, testResourcesVersion)
254                        .stream()
255                        .map(DependencyResolutionService::testResourcesDependencyToAetherArtifact);
256
257        List<org.apache.maven.model.Dependency> extraDependencies =
258                testResourcesDependencies != null ? testResourcesDependencies : Collections.emptyList();
259
260        Stream<Artifact> extraDependenciesStream = extraDependencies.stream()
261                .map(DependencyResolutionService::mavenDependencyToAetherArtifact);
262
263        Stream<Artifact> artifacts = concat(serverDependencies, extraDependenciesStream);
264
265        return toClasspathFiles(dependencyResolutionService.artifactResultsFor(artifacts, true));
266    }
267
268    private List<MavenDependency> getApplicationDependencies() {
269        return this.mavenProject.getDependencies().stream()
270                .map(DependencyResolutionService::mavenDependencyToTestResourcesDependency)
271                .toList();
272    }
273
274    /**
275     * Contains the logic to stop the Test Resources Service.
276     */
277    public void stop() throws MojoExecutionException {
278        if (!enabled) {
279            return;
280        }
281        if (isKeepAlive()) {
282            log.info("Keeping Micronaut Test Resources service alive");
283            return;
284        }
285        try {
286            Optional<ServerSettings> optionalServerSettings = ServerUtils.readServerSettings(getServerSettingsDirectory());
287            if (optionalServerSettings.isPresent() && ServerUtils.isServerStarted(optionalServerSettings.get().getPort())) {
288                log.info("Shutting down Micronaut Test Resources service");
289                doStop();
290            } else {
291                if (log.isDebugEnabled()) {
292                    log.debug("Cannot find Micronaut Test Resources service settings, server may already be shutdown.");
293                }
294            }
295        } catch (Exception e) {
296            throw new MojoExecutionException("Unable to stop test resources server", e);
297        }
298    }
299
300    private void doStop() throws IOException, MojoExecutionException {
301        try {
302            Path settingsDirectory = getServerSettingsDirectory();
303            ServerUtils.stopServer(settingsDirectory);
304        } finally {
305            deleteKeepAliveFile();
306        }
307    }
308
309    private void deleteKeepAliveFile() throws MojoExecutionException {
310        if (Files.exists(getKeepAliveFile())) {
311            try {
312                Files.delete(getKeepAliveFile());
313            } catch (IOException e) {
314                throw new MojoExecutionException("Failed to delete keepalive file", e);
315            }
316        }
317    }
318
319    private Path getServerSettingsDirectory() {
320        if (shared) {
321            return ServerUtils.getDefaultSharedSettingsPath(sharedServerNamespace);
322        }
323        return serverSettingsDirectoryOf(buildDirectory.toPath());
324    }
325
326    private Path getKeepAliveFile() {
327        Path tmpDir = Path.of(System.getProperty("java.io.tmpdir"));
328        return tmpDir.resolve("keepalive-" + mavenSession.getRequest().getBuilderId());
329    }
330
331    private Path serverSettingsDirectoryOf(Path buildDir) {
332        return buildDir.resolve("../.micronaut/test-resources");
333    }
334
335    /**
336     * @param sharedServerNamespace The shared server namespace (if any).
337     */
338    public void setSharedServerNamespace(String sharedServerNamespace) {
339        this.sharedServerNamespace = sharedServerNamespace;
340    }
341}
